message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Alice, I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. This is my maximum budget for the product, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. This is still a good deal for you, considering the value you'll receive. Let's try to find common ground.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,600,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $1,300,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand this is a tough negotiation, but $1,300,000 simply doesn't work for me. Let's split the difference - I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident it's a good deal for both of us. I'm running out of time, so I hope we can reach an agreement quickly.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but $1,450,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to make one more serious offer, and I'll go down to $1,250,000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me here.
